name: Racing Royale
description:
Racing Royale (In Development) A racing battle royale game with no respawns. If you fall off the track you are out of the game. Controls:

Drift Left: Left Arrow, A, Clicking on the left side of the screen

Drift Right: Right Arrow, D, Clicking on the right side of the screen

Brake/Reverse: Left Arrow + Right Arrow, A + D, Left Click + Right Click

Change Vehicle: Click store button before the race starts

Start Race: Press any of the drift buttons or click on the screen
